features: [LIMITLESS CREATIVITY AND ENDLESS JOY] The flower building toy set offers a world of possibilities where all components are interchangeable, making assembly and disassembly a breeze. Children can freely mix and match various flowers, including lilies, chrysanthemums, plum blossoms, orchids, dwarf morning glories, or create their unique blooms. These flower garden building toys can be combined in countless ways, letting kids revel in boundless delight as they create their unique garden world.

[THE PERFECT TOY FOR KIDS INDOORS AND OUTDOORS] The flower building toy set comes in over 10 vibrant colors designed to capture children's attention, providing hours of quiet entertainment. Children will delight in playing with this garden building toys on their own or sharing the fun with their siblings and friends. Kids love pretending to be little gardeners, watering their garden. This garden toy can be played with in any season and location, be it the living room, bathroom, beach, or park.

[AN EDUCATIONAL TOY FOSTERING COMPREHENSIVE SKILLS IN CHILDREN] This flower garden building toys for girls help parents and teachers expand children's knowledge of flowers. Kids can learn how to plant and water them. The flower building toy set aids children in recognizing colors, counting, while simultaneously sparking their imagination and creativity, enhancing hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, and logical thinking abilities.

[SMART SET, THE ULTIMATE GIFT] The flower building toy set includes 34 flowers, 34 flower centers, 8 green bases, 35 leaves, 22 stems, 24 branches, 2 small flowerpots, 2 saucers, 1 small watering can, 2 windmills, 5 butterflies, and 2 dragonflies. It all fits neatly in a durable storage box with handles, making it easy for children to keep everything in one place and carry it anywhere. This garden building toy perfect for gifting on birthdays, Children's Day, Christmas, or New Year's Day.

[SAFE AND SATISFYING] Our flower building toy set is crafted from durable, eco-friendly, and BPA-free plastic, meeting global safety standards. With a smooth surface for comfort and easy cleaning. These flower garden toys cater to a diverse age range and are particularly recommended for children aged 3 and up. We stand by our products with a risk-free shopping experience. If you're not completely satisfied, don't hesitate to reach out, and we'll provide a full refund or a free replacement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The flower garden building toys for girls set includes 34 flower components (petals, pistils), 34 stamens, 8 green bases, 35 leaves, 22 stems, 24 stem branches, 2 small flower pots, 2 containers, 1 small watering can, 2 windmills, 10 butterflies, and 4 dragonflies. With a total of 171 pieces, this flower building toy set empowers children to construct their own one-of-a-kind garden world, providing them with boundless enjoyment while enhancing their overall skills. Every component is designed to be interchanged, making stacking, disassembling, and reassembling a straightforward and hassle-free processChildren can freely blend the pieces, allowing them to craft limitless combinations and build the garden world of their imaginationChildren will be captivated by the array of over 10 vibrant colors in the flower garden building toy.Kids take delight in using the little watering can to nurture their flowers, stepping into the shoes of a young gardenerChildren have the flexibility to create their garden in outdoor settings like the beach, sandbox, yard, or lawnParents can join their children in the fun of building a garden together, making it a wonderful opportunity for quality family time.

The flower garden building toys serve as fantastic educational activities, making it enjoyable for kids to grasp the intricate structure and forms of flowers. They also assist parents and teachers in imparting lessons on color recognition and counting. Furthermore, these toddler girl gifts toys have the potential to enhance children's understanding of STEM subjects, such as science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. Foster the refinement of motor skills and coordinationInspire children's imaginative and creative thinkingCultivate and boost attention and focus capabilitiesElevate children's capacity for logical and analytical thinking

Our flower garden building toy is crafted from non-toxic plastic, assuring safety for children's play, and it has received Children's Product Testing certification Packed within a storage box, the flower building toy set offers the convenience of keeping all the pieces organized or taking them on the go. This flower garden building toy makes an ideal gift for boys and girls on occasions like birthdays, Children's Day, Christmas, and New Year. Once the flower garden building toys are assembled, they can double as craft decorations. Cleaning them is a breeze – simply rinse with water or wipe with a damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has been the absolute most perfect gift I've ever have given my children. My husband even plays with them making a garden. We have given it as a gift several times and add it to our own collection it is a great bathtime toy also.!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps them occupied
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift I got my 3 year old, and she loves it! It’s so easy, but also makes so many different patters. Keeps her occupied for a very long time and helps with fine motor skills. We build little gardens every day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to assemble, my grandchildren from 1-8 loved it and played quietly for hours.
reviews.reviewText: The only dislike was the butterflies and such were fabric, so we had to make sure they were gentle with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this toy. Brings out her creativity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not recieve all pieces
reviews.reviewText: Super cute but it didn’t come with all the pieces it says it did

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work with other sets
reviews.reviewText: This one isn’t that great. The pieces don’t stay together and they didn’t fit with the other flower sets my daughter had. One star up to two because it seems high quality, I just wish it was the standard like all the other sets out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I’d like to replace this
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Apart of that is broken I like to replace itAnd butterfly are broken tooI would like to send a different address
